title: Math clutch
content: "Dear seniors (hypothetically), if someone hasn't done any math at all and the ISA is tomorrow morning, with just one night to clutch, how would you approach it? Considering you know nothing about Unit 1 and 2 whatsoever, how would you tackle it? (Don’t tell me probability is easy—I’m struggling with the basics.)"

comments.body: Post your query or doubt on ISA/ESA grp, people will help.
